name: 霍弘毅
objective: In this class for non-Majors we will review basic grammar and learn intermediate English grammar.  We will then apply grammar to reading, listening, speaking and pronunciation, and writing exercises.  Students will work from a text that includes actual English from a variety of sources: journalism, popular culture, magazine articles, news reports, and so on.  Students will learn how to listen for ‘gist’, how to read for detail, and how to organize a short explanation or summary for a speech and in writing.
